This would not only reduce carbon emissions but also provide a faster and more efficient way to travel, especially for long distances.

This would result in increased efforts to protect marine habitats and wildlife, and potentially even the development of new technologies to mitigate the effects of pollution and climate change.

This would create new opportunities for recreation and tourism, as well as provide a platform for people to explore and appreciate the beauty of the ocean.
